Used-vehicle price spike ends

latest used-vehicle price spike. After surging by 4.4% in the preceding two months, the

vehicle volume since the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic has constrained the supply of
used vehicles, as leasing has typically been a key source of almost-new used vehicles.
